Hymn.Arabic: 1- احمدوا الرب ادعوا باسمه عرفوا بين الامم باعماله. "
Hymn.English: 105:1 Oh, give thanks to the Lord! Call upon His name; Make known His deeds among the peoples!.

Hymn.Arabic: ۲ سبحوه  و رتلوا له. حدثوا بجميع عَجَائِبِهِ.
Hymn.English: 2 Talk of all His wondrous works
3 Glory in His holy name.     Alleluia
